DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_TITLE: Highly integrated epigenome maps in Arabidopsis - whole genome shotgun bisulfite sequencing
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_ABSTRACT: Part of a set of highly integrated epigenome maps for Arabidopsis thaliana. Keywords: Illumina high-throughput bisulfite sequencing Overall design: Whole genome shotgun bisulfite sequencing of wildtype Arabidopsis plants (Columbia-0), and met1, drm1 drm2 cmt3, and ros1 dml2 dml3 null mutants using the Illumina Genetic Analyzer.
